description: Starts an engagement to a contact or escalation plan. The engagement engages each contact specified in the incident.

parameters.name: ContactId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact being engaged.

parameters.name: Sender
parameters.description: The user that started the engagement.

parameters.name: Subject
parameters.description: The secure subject of the message that was sent to the contact. Use this field for engagements to VOICE or EMAIL.

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The secure content of the message that was sent to the contact. Use this field for engagements to VOICE or EMAIL.

parameters.name: IdempotencyToken
parameters.description: A token ensuring that the operation is called only once with the specified details. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
